lead_paragraph: Magglio Ordonez connected for a three-run shot with two outs in the bottom of the ninth inning that lifted the Tigers over the Oakland Athletics to win the A.L.C.S.
snippet: Magglio Ordonez connected for a three-run shot with two outs in the bottom of the ninth inning that lifted the Tigers over the Oakland Athletics to win the A.L.C.S.
